entry.title: Artsakh rights committee enters key phase of advocacy efforts

media:group.media:title: Artsakh rights committee enters key phase of advocacy efforts
media:group.media:description:
๐ Gyumriโs acting mayor will be a candidate in the municipal election on March 30; heโll run against multiple opposition parties. ๐ The Artsakh rights protection committee, which works toward Artsakh peopleโs right to a secure and dignified resettlement in their homeland, is launching international diplomatic efforts. ๐ A Hetq investigation reveals that in 2023 the Armenian government invested nearly $4 million in a new company linked to Yerevan Mayor Tigran Avinyanโs wife, raising concerns of cronyism. ๐ โNo one is safe from this kind of extremismโ- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k8Dlq0YWzW4

media:group.media:title: Chronicle of a murder foretold
media:group.media:description:
In this special edition of the CivilNet podcast, commentator Eric Hacopian raises the alarm on Azerbaijanโs hidden intentions behind the expulsion of the International Committee of the Red Cross, which he believes is to murder Ruben Vardanyan and the other Armenian hostages who are currently enduring sham trials and torture in Baku. He explains what the Armenian government, international partners, and Armenians throughout the world must urgently do to prevent the worst.

media:group.media:title: ีีซึีซีกีตีธึีด ีซึีกีพีซีณีกีฏีจ ีขีกึีคีกีถีกีฌีธึ ีดีซีฟีธึีดีถีฅึ ีธึีถีซ. ีฆึีธึีตึ ีีกีตีฏ ีีธีนีกึีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ
media:group.media:description:
ีีซึีซีกีตีธึีด ีกีฌีกีพีซีถีฅึีซ ีถีฏีกีฟีดีกีดีข ีณีถีทีธึีดีถีฅึีถ ีธึ ีขีผีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีจ ีฏีกีถีญีกีฟีฅีฝีฅีฌีซ ีงีซีถ, ีฏีกึีฎีธึีด ีง ีกึีกีขีกีฃีฅีฟ, ิตีี ีีกีฒีกึีกีฏึีฉีกีฏีกีถ ีธึ ีดีทีกีฏีธึีฉีกีตีซีถ ีฐีฅีฟีกีฆีธีฟีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีฏีฅีถีฟึีธีถีซ ีฃีซีฟีกีทีญีกีฟีธีฒ ีีกีตีฏ ีีธีนีกึีตีกีถีจึ ิธีฝีฟ ีถึีกี ีคีฅีบึีฅึีจ ึีธึีตึ ีฟีพีฅึีซีถ, ีธึ ีีซึีซีกีตีซ ีถีธึ ีขีกีถีกีฏีธึีด ีฃีธึีฎีธึีด ีฅีถ ีฟีกึีขีฅึ ีญีดีขีกีพีธึีธึีดีถีฅึ, ีธึีธีถึ ีคีฅีผ ีจีถีคีฐีกีถีธึึ ีฐีกีดีกีฏีกึีฃีซ ีดีกีฝ ีนีฅีถ ีคีกึีฑีฅีฌึ ีีธีนีกึีตีกีถีจ, ีกีถีคึีกีคีกีผีถีกีฌีธีพ ีดีซีปีกีฆีฃีกีตีซีถ ีคีฅึีกีฏีกีฟีกึีถีฅึีซ ีกึีฑีกีฃีกีถึีซีถ, ีถีฏีกีฟีธึีด ีง, ิปึีกีถีซ ีธึ ิปีฝึีกีตีฅีฌีซ ีทีกีฐีฅึีจ ีฐีกีดีกีฐีธึีถีน ีฅีถ ีีซึีซีกีตีซ ีฏีกีผีกีพีกึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีกึึีธึีดึ

ีีฅึีปีซีถ ึ ึีฅึีซีถ ีีซึีซีกีตีซ ิผีกีฉีกึีซีก ึ ีีกึีฟีธึีฝ ีถีกีฐีกีถีฃีถีฅึีธึีด ีฆีซีถีพีกีฎ ีขีกีญีธึีดีถีฅึ ีฅีถ ีฟีฅีฒีซ ีธึีถีฅึีฅีฌ ีฟีกีบีกีฌีพีกีฎ ีถีกีญีกีฃีกีฐ ิฒีกีทีกึ ิฑีฝีกีคีซ ีฏีธีฒีดีถีกีฏีซึ ีฆีซีถีตีกีฌีถีฅึีซ ึ ีีซึีซีกีตีซ ีกีถีพีฟีกีถีฃีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีธึีชีฅึีซ ีดีซีปึ, ีธึีธีถึ ีพีฅึีกีณีฅีฌ ีฅีถ ีญีกีฒีกีฒ ีขีถีกีฏีนีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีทึีปีกีถีธึีด ีกีพีฅีฌีซ ึีกีถ 800 ีฆีธีฐีซึ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีจ ีฏีกีบ ีง ีฐีกีฝีฟีกีฟีฅีฌ ิผีกีฉีกึีซีกีตีซ ีขีถีกีฏีซีน ิณีธีฐีกึ ีีฅึีฝีซีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟึ ีีฅึีปีซีถีฝ ีถีฅึีฏีกีตีกึึีฅีฌ ีง ีซึีกีคึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ึีกีฒีกึีธึีดึ

entry.title: "No one is safe from this kind of extremism" as Alawites massacred in Syria

media:group.media:title: "No one is safe from this kind of extremism" as Alawites massacred in Syria
media:group.media:description:
Basel Issmail is a resident of Armenia with roots in the coastal regions of Syria, where in recent days hundreds of his fellow Alawis have been massacred by forces with links to the new government, with confirmed casualties continuing to rise. He joined us to talk about the first-hand accounts of the violence he has heard from those close to him still in the Latakia region and to sound the alarm about this ongoing ethnic cleansing. With reports of Armenians having been killed as well, Issmail warns that every minority group in Syria is a potential target.
0:00- Who are the Alawite community in Syria? 2:40- How did the takeover by HTS paramilitary lead to massacres? 5:34- Terrorism being fueled through social media platforms. 6:14- Are other minority groups like Armenians in danger as well? 8:18- Why is there very little reporting on the killings?

entry.title: International Women's Day in Armenia: The Numbers #shorts

media:group.media:title: International Women's Day in Armenia: The Numbers #shorts
media:group.media:description:
March 8 is International Womenโs Day, and in Armenia, itโs widely celebrated by men giving women flowers, gifts, and even heartfelt speeches. But beyond the joyous celebrations, some are criticizing the holidayโs superficial nature, in light of the unaddressed challenges women continue to face in Armenia.

media:group.media:title: ีีกึีซ ีธึ ีฏีกึีซ ีญีถีคีซึโค ีกึึีกีญึีซีถีฅึีจ ีดีฟีกีฐีธีฃีพีกีฎ ีฅีถ ีกีปีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฏึีณีกีฟีดีกีดีข
media:group.media:description:
ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีฏีกีผีกีพีกึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฏีธีฒีดีซึ ิฑึึีกีญีซึ ีขีผีถีซ ีฟีฅีฒีกีฐีกีถีพีกีฎ ีกีถีฑีกีถึ ีกีดีฅีถ ีกีดีซีฝ ีฟึีกีดีกีคึีพีธีฒ 50,000 ีคึีกีด ีกีปีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีทีกีฐีกีผีธึีถีฅึีซ ีฉีซีพีถ ีธึ ีฃีธึีดีกึีถ ีกีฝีฟีซีณีกีถีกีขีกึ ีฏึีณีกีฟีพีฅีฌีธึ ีฅีถึ
ิฑีบึีซีฌีซึ ีฝีฏีฝีกีฎี ีฃีธึีดีกึีจ ีฏีฏีกีฆีดีซ 40,000 ีคึีกีด, ีกีปีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีฏีฟึีกีดีกีคึีพีซ ีดีซีถีนึ 18 ีฟีกึีฅีฏีกีถ ีฅึีฅีญีกีถีฅึีซีถ (ีทีธึึีป 33,000 ีกีถีฑ), 63 ึ ีกีพีฅีฌีซ ีฟีกึีฅีฏีกีถ ีกีถีฑีกีถึ (18,000 ีกีถีฑ), ีฏีฅึีกีฏึีธีฒีซีถ ีฏีธึึีถีฅีฌีธึ ีคีฅีบึีธึีด ีถีบีกีฝีฟ ีฏีกีด ีฏีฅีถีฝีกีฉีธีทีกีฏ ีฝีฟีกึีธีฒ ีฏีกีด 1-ีซีถ ีฏีกีด 2-ึีค ีญีดีขีซ ีฐีกีทีดีกีถีคีกีดีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีธึีถีฅึีธีฒ ีกีถีฑีกีถึ (ีดีธีฟ 2,600 ีดีกึีค): ิฑีตีฝ ีกีถีฑีซีถึ 40,000 ีคึีกีดีถีฅึีจ ีฏีฝีฟีกีถีกีถ ีดีซีถีนึ ีฐีธึีถีซีฝีจ ีถีฅึีกีผีตีกีฌ, ีซีฝีฏ ีฐีธึีฌีซีฝีซึ 40,000-ีจ ีฏีคีกีผีถีก 30,000ึ
ีึีธีทีธึีดีจ ีฝีธึีซีกีฌีกีฏีกีถ ีฌีธึึีป ีญีถีคีซึ ีง ีฟีฅีฒีกีฐีกีถีพีกีฎ ีจีถีฟีกีถีซึีถีฅึีซ ีฐีกีดีกึึ
